attributes.action: paid time off to home school
attributes.additional_details: I work for the nhs under current situations we are all struggling with work load, I work with parents who are home schooling, they are struggling combining work and home schooling and are physically and mentally drained
attributes.background: Paid time off for parents to home school

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559231
